channel.title: Vexillum Final Version 3
channel.description:
[list][center][size="6"][b]Project Vexillum[/b][/size][/center] [center][size="4"][b]The [i]Final[/i] Version - #3.[/b][/size][/center]
[b][i]UPDATES WILL BE POSTED IN ORDER, IN THIS POST.[/i][/b]
[b]Beta currently is under closed testing, developing stage.[/b] I'm hosting it from my computer. Most of staff members have the special client to log-on.
[b][center]Updates Blog[/center][/b]
[ul][b]July 23.[/b] [*]Added new spawn point. [*]Added basic doors on new home (Open/Close) [*]Removed Wheats and Patatoes field objects. [*]Spawned Yaks. [*]Added Yak Animations + Combat animations. [*]Clipped Yaks field + Cabbage field [*]Clipped wood 1st part [*]Added new wilderness area. [*]Done with Danger Levels. [*]Added Cabbage picking up system. [*]Removed all teleports. Home teleport will bring you to home (Will be removed after 5 of release day) [*]Added new death spawn spot. [*]Added new water textures. [*]Done with all stalls (Thieving). Users will be able to gain a item and cash in rounded amounts. [*]Done with mining. [img]http://www.bildites.lv/images/ud3t9qbtxos1xihsbl5.png[/img] [*]Added Furnace. [*]Done with ALL Home doors. [*]Added Goblins. [*]Added Goblin animations + drops. [*]Added Hills giants. [*]Added Hills giants animations + drops. [*]Added Chickens. [*]Added Chickens animations + drops. [*]Added food suplies store at home. (1st) [b]July 24.[/b] [*]Done with ALL isle doors (open/close) [*]Added different Hills. [*]Added Slayer, Attack, Defence, Range stores, capes. [*]Added Skeletons. [*]Added Unban, Ban (player can be offline), unmute, ipmute commands for moderators, to fully control server. [*]Added Magic store. [*]Added Dummys and Ranged Targets [*]Added Barrels for Defence training. [*]Added Sewer Valves for strength training. [*]Clipped 100% Home Castle [img]http://img651.imageshack.us/img651/2517/clipo.png[/img] [*]Wilderness Signs + Warnings [img]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/9223/49853643.gif[/img] [b]July 25.[/b] [*]Added following stores, skillmasters, monsters: - Fishing Skill master - Flowers Girl - General Store - Prayer Master - Market Guards. - Wolves - Unicorns - Amulets store [*]Finished with Fishing! [*]Wilderness Castle will be Multi zone from now. [*]Added bank to "MB" spot. (Wildy) [*]Added new welcoming dialogue (custom and pretty funny) [*]Added Music Channel buttons to client. [*] Finished with Clipping. (ALL Safe Zones are fully clipped from now. Still to do: All Wilderness) [b]June 26.[/b] [*]Spawned Woodcutting Tree spawns. [img]http://www.bildites.lv/images/0p6d8eqne19a48ttd6.png[/img] [*][u]Fixed PvP, PvN Bug, where users were able to multi attack opponents at the same time.[/u] (Attack at the same second) [*]Fixed PvP Dupe. [*]Added Herblore, Thieving, Mining skill masters. [*]Added non-attackable npcs like foxs, sharks, seagulls, gulls, swans. [*]Added Pirates and rogues. [*]Added Mini Map Icons. [img]http://www.bildites.lv/images/cmb71ketotf1406xv0e8.png[/img] [img]http://www.bildites.lv/images/wzld041wgqrgy4sotwu.png[/img] [*]Added Aubury Runecrafting skill master.
END of Updates. Search on thread for more updates.[/ul]
[b]Want to show some support through forums?[/b] Add this to your signature. [code][center][url="http://vexillumrs.com/index.php?/topic/1010-version-3"][img]http://www.bildites.lv/images/gooeo3q858osso1zkgt.png[/img][/url][/center][/code]

item.title: Vexillum Final Version 3
item.dc:creator: @CreatorAlex CreatorAlex
item.description:
@CreatorAlex wrote:

Did you add icons to the map? If you did I wanna know how.

Read full topic

sounds epic, that was always my home on my old source, and it was kickass. i did practically the same thing for my wilderness levels too.

Read full topic

item.title: Vexillum Final Version 3
item.dc:creator: @dators6 dators6
item.description:
@dators6 wrote:

[list][center][size=“6”]Project Vexillum[/size][/center]
[center][size=“4”]The Final Version - #3.[/size][/center]

UPDATES WILL BE POSTED IN ORDER, IN THIS POST.

Beta currently is under closed testing, developing stage.
I’m hosting it from my computer. Most of staff members have the special client to log-on.

[center]Updates Blog[/center]

[ul]July 23.
[]Added new spawn point.
[]Added basic doors on new home (Open/Close)
[]Removed Wheats and Patatoes field objects.
[]Spawned Yaks.
[]Added Yak Animations + Combat animations.
[]Clipped Yaks field + Cabbage field
[]Clipped wood 1st part
[]Added new wilderness area.
[]Done with Danger Levels.
[]Added Cabbage picking up system.
[]Removed all teleports. Home teleport will bring you to home (Will be removed after 5 of release day)
[]Added new death spawn spot.
[]Added new water textures.
[]Done with all stalls (Thieving). Users will be able to gain a item and cash in rounded amounts.
[]Done with mining.

ud3t9qbtxos1xihsbl5.png724×364

[]Added Furnace.
[]Done with ALL Home doors.
[]Added Goblins.
[]Added Goblin animations + drops.
[]Added Hills giants.
[]Added Hills giants animations + drops.
[]Added Chickens.
[]Added Chickens animations + drops.
[]Added food suplies store at home. (1st)
July 24.
[]Done with ALL isle doors (open/close)
[]Added different Hills.
[]Added Slayer, Attack, Defence, Range stores, capes.
[]Added Skeletons.
[]Added Unban, Ban (player can be offline), unmute, ipmute commands for moderators, to fully control server.
[]Added Magic store.
[]Added Dummys and Ranged Targets
[]Added Barrels for Defence training.
[]Added Sewer Valves for strength training.
[]Clipped 100% Home Castle

[]Wilderness Signs + Warnings

July 25.
[]Added following stores, skillmasters, monsters:

  • Fishing Skill master
  • Flowers Girl
  • General Store
  • Prayer Master
  • Market Guards.
  • Wolves
  • Unicorns
  • Amulets store
    []Finished with Fishing!
    [    ]Wilderness Castle will be Multi zone from now.
    []Added bank to “MB” spot. (Wildy)
    [    ]Added new welcoming dialogue (custom and pretty funny)
    []Added Music Channel buttons to client.
    [    ] Finished with Clipping. (ALL Safe Zones are fully clipped from now. Still to do: All Wilderness)
    June 26.
    []Spawned Woodcutting Tree spawns.
    0p6d8eqne19a48ttd6.png760×497

    [    ]Fixed PvP, PvN Bug, where users were able to multi attack opponents at the same time. (Attack at the same second)
    []Fixed PvP Dupe.
    [    ]Added Herblore, Thieving, Mining skill masters.
    []Added non-attackable npcs like foxs, sharks, seagulls, gulls, swans.
    [    ]Added Pirates and rogues.
    []Added Mini Map Icons.
    cmb71ketotf1406xv0e8.png729×246

    wzld041wgqrgy4sotwu.png754×336

    [    ]Added Aubury Runecrafting skill master.

END of Updates. Search on thread for more updates.[/ul]
